name: project-root
description: ## Alumnos: - Agustín Ferrari 240503 - Joaquín Meerhoff 247096 - Graziano Pascale 186821

scripts.buildElectionSubSystem: cd ./SRC/ElectionSubSystem/ && npm install && tsc -b && cp package*.json ../dist/ElectionSubSystem/ && cp -R ./config  ../dist/ElectionSubSystem/ && cd ../dist/ElectionSubSystem/ && npm ci --production
scripts.buildCommon: cd ./SRC/Common/ && npm install && tsc -b && cp package*.json ../dist/Common/ && cp -R ./config  ../dist/Common/ && cp -R ./Validators/config.json ../dist/Common/Validators && cd ../dist/Common/ && npm ci --production
scripts.buildAll: npm run buildCommon && npm run buildElectionSubSystem && cd ./SRC && tsc -b
scripts.all: npm run electoralAPI & npm run electionSubSystem
